name: TARA (EbbDrop)
description:
You are the last turret alive but it won't be long before you also succumb to the enemy. Delay the inevitable for as long as possible to secure a high score!

Controls:

  • Mouse: Aim
  • Left click/Space: Shoot

Made in Godod using Incscape, Krita, Laigter, Silen Wolf, Bosca Ceoi and sfxr on arch linux

(Mac is untested)
